data.title: Assam down town University, Guwahati is on Mission to Create Thriving Academic Culture
data.meta_description: Guwahati. 05 February 2021: Promoted by down town Charity Trust, Assam down town University was established in 2010 as per the provision of Assam Private Universities Act, 2007. Since then, we are seizing opportunities to shape our university for winning the new future, securing our position amongst the leading universities; be recognized for the quality […]
data.text:
Guwahati. 05 February 2021: Promoted by down town Charity Trust, Assam down town University was established in 2010 as per the provision of Assam Private Universities Act, 2007. Since then, we are seizing opportunities to shape our university for winning the new future, securing our position amongst the leading universities; be recognized for the quality of our system, products, securing prestigious partnership with international academia and industry.

With the strongest urge to respond to the need of quality education at an affordable cost for the people of the North Eastern Region of India, down town Charity Trust established it as a multi-disciplinary university. The university has its expertise in the field of Engineering and Technology, Nursing, Paramedical Science, Commerce & Management, Tourism and hospitality, Humanities and social science, Pharmaceutical sciences etc.

AdtU is NAAC Accredited and it is the only university in the north eastern region to receive ISO 9001-2015 Quality management system. AdtU is one of the region’s leading university and has been ranked 24th among the 50 Best Private Universities in India as per India Today magazine in 2018. AdtU has received many awards and accolades such as E-learning excellence for academic digitisation from QS-IGAUGE, Best Private University in Assam by Times Business awards 2019, India’s 10th Best Private University for 2018 by Knowledge Review Magazine.

ACCREDITATION:

NAAC – National Assesment and Accreditation Council

UGC – University Grants Commission

AICTE-All India Council for Technical Education

INC -Indian Nursing Council

PCI – Pharmacy Council of India

IAP – The Indian Association of Physiotherapists

SGS.ISO 9001:2015- For provision of Higher Educational Services.

Environment both inside and outside the classroom: We implement strict discipline policy, well stocked library, particular approach to teaching and learning like group projects, individual assignments, quizzes and tests. Special focus is put on the development of social competencies and overall personality through community programmes, entrepreneurship programmes, soft skills development programmes etc. Students can also get engaged in different extracurricular activities that support what is taught in classes.

Job placement rate: The institution enables the students to acquire marketable skills in the present job scenario. Placement records indicate placement in the range of 80 – 100 %.

Physical and psychological safety for their ward: At AdtU we have strict anti-bully and anti-ragging environment, 24 hours CCTV monitoring, cohesive multicultural environment, medical emergency services, OPD and counselling centres. The hostels have zero records of suicide since establishment of the university.

Location of the institution: Although situated in a city like Guwahati, the university is in located in a calm and picturesque environment which helps in soothing the minds thereby promoting a learning environment.

Affordability: At AdtU we have provision for scholarships and loans for deserving students based upon merit as well as economic condition.

Qualification and experience of teachers: Highly experienced and qualified teachers are present in this university
